features: One 50 fl oz bottle of OxiClean Odor Blasters Odor and Stain Remover laundry booster liquid to get out tough stains and stubborn smells
Oxygen-based, water-activated laundry booster gets out tough dirt, persistent spots and set-in stains, plus eliminates sweat and body odors

Liquid laundry booster works with regular detergent in HE or standard washers as a laundry stain remover and odor neutralizer for machine-washable clothing, sheets, towels, workout clothes, shoes, team uniforms, and pet bedding
Tough on stains yet gentle on fabric, this chlorine-free, color-safe stain cleaner formula removes odors and stains to help keep the clothes you love looking their best

Mix OxiClean Odor Blasters Odor & Stain Remover liquid with water as a laundry presoak, use to pretreat tough stains, or pour this laundry detergent booster into dispenser or washer drum along with your regular detergent, following label directions
body.description: Harness the power of oxygen to remove tough stains and odors with OxiClean Odor Blasters Odor and Stain Remover Laundry Booster from America’s #1 stain remover additive brand(1), the answer to odors, and big and small stains, for your laundry. This oxygen-powered, chlorine-free, color-safe laundry stain remover and odor eliminator helps remove stubborn smells and stains from machine-washable clothing, sheets, towels, workout clothes, shoes, team uniforms, and pet bedding. It attacks tough odors like body odor and sweat to leave items smelling clean and refreshed. For best results, presoak clothes in a mixture of this odor remover liquid and water, following label directions. You can also pretreat stains by applying this liquid directly to the stain, then washing as usual. Simply pour this laundry detergent booster along with your regular laundry detergent into your HE or standard washing machine, following label directions, to eliminate tough odors and stains. The 66 fl oz bottle has enough laundry booster for many loads, so you can fight odor fearlessly. From stain removers and laundry boosters to household cleaners and much more, OxiClean offers a product to fit your needs. (1) Based on units sold

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pre-Soak To remove tough stains & odors mix 1 capful of OxiClean with Odor Blasters Laundry Booster per gallon of the warmest water recommended by the garment care label. Submerge laundry in solution and soak for 3 to 6 hours, then wash as normal with detergent and OxiClean. Load into Washer Standard Machines: Add OxiClean with Odor Blasters Laundry Booster plus your favorite detergent before adding laundry. For regular loads, fill to Bar A. For larger loads, add more. HE machines: Add OxiClean with Odor Blasters Laundry Booster with your detergent into dispenser. Fill to Bar A. Enjoy Clean, Refreshing Laundry Experience great delight using OxiClean with Odor Blasters Laundry Booster!

OxiClean with Odor Blasters Stain & Odor Remover Laundry Booster Liquid OxiClean White Revive Laundry Whitener & Stain Remover Powder OxiClean with Odor Blasters Versatile Stain & Odor Remover Powder OxiClean Max Force Stain Remover Spray OxiClean HD Laundry Detergent, Sparkling Fresh More Laundry Plus OxiClean Use OxiClean with Odor Blasters with regular detergent for an extra strong clean to blast away the strongest odors and stains. Works with your detergent to whiten clothes, without the harsh smell or damaging effects of chlorine. Combine OxiClean with Odor Blasters with regular detergent to tackle tough odors and set-in stains. Combines 5 types of stain fighters to get out more of the toughest dried-in stains. Start every load with this detergent to remove dried-on stains, reveal bright colors, and restore radiant whites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kills odors! And Amazon Shipping makes sure it won’t leak…Yay!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is fabulous. My brother has incontinence issues and I have to wash items every morning, to keep odors at bay. This formula of OxyClean does the trick! AND… I so appreciate Amazon using The Gripper labels and wrapping these so there are no spills or leakage. Awesome. 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product!
reviews.reviewText: This product really does what it says. It leaves my laundry with a fresh, clean smell. So glad I decided to give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans up unpleasant odors
reviews.reviewText: If my wash remains in the washer for too long (occasionally happens), clothes can develop a slightly moldy smell. REALLY don’t like that. I have found that by adding a couple ounces to the soap I use (various brands) that does not occur any more. WELL WORTH IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used this produce before and like it's performance, that why I got more from you all. I would suggest that the top is double taped because one of the two bottles leaked. I was able to bring the package in before too much liquid was lost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love Arming Hammet, this odor booster has been my favor for some time now. Makes your close smell so fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works great, shipping was bad
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd bottle I have ordered on Amazon. The first came quickly, packaged well, and undamaged. This package was delivered intact, not a dent in the box. Inside this bottle of OxiClean was inside a sealed plastic bag, the cap was taped, and there was a half cap of purple liquid OxiClean floating around inside the plastic bag. It was all fully encased, nothing leaked outside of that plastic bag. I put it inside the washing machine, cut the top of the bag, removed the bottle, turned the bag inside out and used it for the load of laundry. So I did not lose any. I do not know what the supplier could have done differently to prevent the leakage as it all appeared to have been packaged well. So, no complaints, accidents happen. I will order the product again as it works, I will just hope it does not leak!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'll never go without it...
reviews.reviewText: I, honestly, was expecting it to have leaked inside the box as I'd seen in several previous reviews. There wasn't even a drop leaked. Fabulous!I couldn't wait to try this in my portable washing machine. Towels, socks, rags and such just never seemed to smell clean. I noticed after the first load that everything smells fantastic!This is an ADDITIVE to be used together with your usual laundry soap, just in case you've not completely read through the description.Amazing scent! Amazing product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my Oxy Clean Odor Blaster Laundry Booster today and I am so satisfied. Yesterday I was reading some reviews up here and I got a little scared because some people said that the product stinks. No it doesn't! It smells wonderful! I just ordered two more bottles. It's just my son and myself and it's very rare that our dirty clothes stink. I originally purchased this product because I need a laundry booster mainly for my sons shirts that are blue red and white to keep the white bright. But I also love my laundered clothes to smell fresh. This will do both. I'm going to continue to add this product to my laundering process.

Bought this by accident..I was looking at carpet cleaner solution and somehow got to this through linking below. However, I chose to keep it anyway because it smells really really good. Leaked inside box and on bottle about an ounce so maybe something to seal the cap better for shipping would be a good idea.

If you are at all sensitive to smells, beware!!!The smell of this is totally horrible. Like the worst and cheapest perfume in the world mixed with weird baby powder smell. I returned asap but it had gotten broken in delivery so it soaked the rest of the items I bought and got all over my house and I could smell it for days and days. I have a headache just thinking about the smell honestly.
Sa fait disparaître le jaunissement de mon Kimono. Très bon nettoyant.
